Hardin County Fair Royalty

Lance Good will be representing Hardin Northern as the 2020 Hardin County Fair Royalty King contestant. Lance is the son of Brent and Jennie Good of Kenton. Lance is a very active student within the school district. He participates in Football, Basketball, Baseball, Track & Field. He has served two terms as the Hardin Northern FFA president and is also an officer for the History Brigade club. Lance is a member of the Hardin County Junior Fairboard and exhibits market goats at the county fair.

Maddie Grappy is Hardin Northern's Queen representative for the Hardin County Fair royalty contest. Maddie is the daughter of Josh and Denise Grappy of Dola. She has been an FFA officer for three years and has also played basketball and softball throughout her high school career. She is a member of the National Honor Society, Student Council, and has been on the Junior Fairboard for two years.

They worked in groups to find their own instruments, notate a score, and perform their score. Below you can find the some photos from this project.
